source.b52ef8a0:
It is a dataset for classification of stars.


Temperature--Temperature(K)

L -- Relative Luminosity

R -- Relative Radius

A_M -- Absolute Magnitude

Color -- General Obs. Color

Spectral_Class -- SMASS Spec.

Type -- Type One-Hot from 0 - 5
